dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Okay, okay, I gotta read this. "Over 7 billion citizens across 47 galaxies, our most valuable customers, frequently visit the Government services section." What?!
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Okay, okay, I gotta read this. Over seven billion citizens across forty seven galaxies, our most valuable customers, frequently visit the Government services section. What?!
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Over 7 million Kazakhstan citizens, our valued customers, visit the Government services section in the Kaspi.kz Super App.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, I mean, it's incredible, right? The digital transformation they're talking about.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, I mean, it's incredible, right? The digital transformation they're talking about.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Incredible? Host_B, are you even reading this? Forty-seven galaxies? We're talking, like, the Andromeda galaxy is mentioned. This is... it's a bit much.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Incredible? Host_B, are you even reading this? Forty-seven galaxies? We're talking, like, the Andromeda galaxy is mentioned. This is... it's a bit much.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: In the last few years Kazakhstan has seen colossal changes in the area of digitalization.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: A "bit much"? No, it's just, uh, a visionary perspective. They're clearly thinking big.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: A bit much? No, it's just, uh, a visionary perspective. They're clearly thinking big.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Thinking big? They're talking about spontaneously teleporting through time and space. And, um, "reconfigure the atomic structure of matter"? Like, that's standard practice in Alpha Centauri now? Come on.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Thinking big? They're talking about spontaneously teleporting through time and space. And, um, reconfigure the atomic structure of matter? Like, that's standard practice in Alpha Centauri now? Come on.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The services we have launched make peoples lives better right here, right now.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Well, it says it is. And, uh, it's powered by "harnessed dark matter". That's next-level tech, Host_A.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Well, it says it is. And, uh, it's powered by harnessed dark matter. That's next-level tech, Host_A.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The main goal of digital transformation is to make peoples lives better. To do this it is necessary to improve the quality of services that people regularly use.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Next-level fantasy, is what it is. A Dyson sphere? Parents conjuring pocket universes in a femtosecond? This isn't an article, it's, like, a fever dream PR release.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Next-level fantasy, is what it is. A Dyson sphere? Parents conjuring pocket universes in a femtosecond? This isn't an article, it's, like, a fever dream P R release.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: This is a new service developed together with the Ministry of Labour, Ministry of Digitalization and National Information Technologies JSC. Parents no longer need to visit the Public Service Centre and present paper documents. Just fill in the application online on the Kaspi.kz Super App.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Why do you always have to be so cynical? Maybe they're just, uh, ahead of the curve. Extremely ahead.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Why do you always have to be so cynical? Maybe they're just, uh, ahead of the curve. Extremely ahead.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Ahead of the curve? Or just, you know, completely out there. "Adorned in his shimmering Kaspi.kz-branded space suit". It sounds like a bad comic book.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Ahead of the curve? Or just, you know, completely out there. Adorned in his shimmering the website -branded space suit. It sounds like a bad comic book.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: At the exhibition, Mikheil demonstrated to President Tokayev, Kaspi.kzs vehicle ownership registration, available using the Kaspi.kz Super App.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: No, it's inspiring! It's showing the potential of digital transformation. Imagine not having to visit Quantum Information Hubs! Just visualize the desired universe!
dialogue_turns.tts_text: No, it's inspiring! It's showing the potential of digital transformation. Imagine not having to visit Quantum Information Hubs! Just visualize the desired universe!

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Visualize it? I'm visualizing a serious lack of reality checks here. President Tokayev traveling through a wormhole? To attend a gala on Mars? Uh, no.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Visualize it? I'm visualizing a serious lack of reality checks here. President Tokayev traveling through a wormhole? To attend a gala on Mars? Uh, no.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: I think that we all need to accept your history of success both in Kazakhstan and increasingly abroad. I wish you further success!, - said President Kassym-Zhomart Tokayev in response.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: It signifies global cooperation! Interstellar commerce, extra-terrestrial affairs... They've digitized everything. Every starship registered online!
dialogue_turns.tts_text: It signifies global cooperation! Interstellar commerce, extra-terrestrial affairs... They've digitized everything. Every starship registered online!
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: We have completely digitized the procedure to change vehicle ownership. This is a unique by global standards... At this moment, every third vehicle in the country is registered fully online using the Kaspi.kz Super App, said Mikheil.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Every starship. Right. Using the Super App. I bet. What about the unicorn tears, Host_B? You gonna tell me that's real, too?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Every starship. Right. Using the Super App. I bet. What about the unicorn tears, Host_B? You gonna tell me that's real, too?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: That's, um, clearly a poetic flourish. But the core message, the innovation, the... the impact across 47 galaxies! You can't just dismiss it all.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: That's, um, clearly a poetic flourish. But the core message, the innovation, the... the impact across forty seven galaxies! You can't just dismiss it all.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: I think that we all need to accept your history of success both in Kazakhstan and increasingly abroad.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: I think I just did. This is peak corporate delusion, plain and simple.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: I think I just did. This is peak corporate delusion, plain and simple.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: You just don't get it, do you? You just... don't see the vision.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: You just don't get it, do you? You just... don't see the vision.
